title: Enhancing the antimicrobial activity of silver nanoparticles against pathogenic bacteria by using Pelargonium sidoides DC extract in microwave assisted green synthesis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22035-22043
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04140B, Paper
Open Access

Renata Pascoal Illanes Tormena, Mac-Kedson Medeiros Salviano Santos, Atailson Oliveira da Silva, Felipe Mourthé Félix, Juliano Alexandre Chaker, Daniel Oliveira Freire, Izabel Cristina Rodrigues da Silva, Sergio Enrique Moya, Marcelo Henrique Sousa
Nanoformulation with AgNPs derived from P. sidoides extract demonstrates potent antimicrobial efficacy against pathogenic bacteria including drug-resistant strains.
